item.title: Trump administration sues California over egg prices and blames animal welfare laws
item.description: The Trump administration is suing California over its animal welfare laws, claiming they unconstitutionally raised egg prices

item.title: Authorities say 200 immigrants arrested in raids on 2 Southern California farms
item.description: Federal immigration authorities say they've arrested about 200 immigrants suspected of being in the country illegally during raids on two California f...

item.title: Boxer Gervonta 'Tank' Davis arrested in South Florida on misdemeanor domestic violence charge
item.description: Professional boxer Gervonta “Tank” Davis has been arrested in South Florida on a misdemeanor domestic violence charge

item.title: Truck smashes through barrier and plunges off a bridge into the Delaware River
item.description: A tractor-trailer cab plunged off the Delaware Memorial Bridge into the Delaware River near Wilmington

item.title: Jannik Sinner beats Novak Djokovic at Wimbledon and will face Carlos Alcaraz in the final
item.description: Jannik Sinner beats Novak Djokovic at Wimbledon and will face Carlos Alcaraz in the final
